update.releaseNotes:
v2.1.0 - Changelog
- Changed color of overlay button to distinctly show when the bot is running or not. - The application will now automatically check for new updates online. - The options of hiding comparison results and selecting all Support Cards are enabled by default. - Added a new option to select all Characters. - Updated the status display on the Home screen. - Fixed bug where Tesseract object was released and it was still being used later.
